title: Emergency Response Activation
summary: As an older adult, I want to quickly activate emergency alerts using a simple voice command so that I can receive prompt assistance in crisis situations.

title: Medication Management
summary: As an older adult, I want to set and receive reminders for my medication intake and refills so that I can manage my health effectively and maintain my independence.

title: Intuitive User Interface Design
summary: As an older adult, I want an easy-to-navigate interface so that I can interact with ALFRED without frustration or confusion.

title: Personalized Interaction History
summary: As an older adult, I want to easily access a history of my interactions with ALFRED so that I can review past commands and responses to better understand the system and improve my engagement.

title: Social Engagement Tracking
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to track my participation in social activities so that I can receive feedback and encouragement to stay socially engaged.

title: Assisted Setup for Non-Tech Savvy Users
summary: As an older adult, I want an assisted setup option for ALFRED so that I can easily complete the installation and configuration without needing external help.

title: Flexible Activity Scheduling
summary: As an older adult, I want to customize my schedules for physical and cognitive activities using voice commands so that I can easily align them with my daily routines and preferences.
